mainText:
Do not write in English very well, but I did my best to express the void in the world will have after the death of this genius
The world lost an incredible person, a genius that mankind will miss.
Jobs made a progress in 56 years something that mankind will take at least 100 years to execute the same.
His death will leave a void in the world and the feeling that we lost a genius.
my condolences
author: Thalis
